Others: Udoka expressed surprise at the Rockets' lack of running in the first game.
The Rockets allowed Charlotte to outrebound them 56 to 43, leading to 61 second-half points, 15 3s, and 42 points in the paint.
The Rockets had a slow pace (96.0 possessions per 48 minutes) and scored just 13 fast-break points.
Thompson's presence was critical, finishing with 13 points and four rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench.
Udoka experimented with different lineups, emphasizing the importance of pace and transition play.
